biotools.summary: DeconvTest is a Python-based simulation framework that allows the user to quantify and compare the performance of different deconvolution methods. The framework integrates all components needed for such quantitative comparison and consists of three main modules: (1) in silico microscopy, (2) deconvolution, and (3) performance quantification.
